author: skitching
msg: Minor tweak: return zero-length array rather than null, to make life easier for callers.

author: skitching
msg: Fix theoretical bug with callers that use a deprecated method on parent type.

author: skitching
msg: Wake all threads, not just one, as pointed out by FindBugs report. In the case of Orchestra, the previous code was fine as we never used locks of this type in complex conditions. But this is written as a general-purpose class, and FindBugs is right that in the general-purpose case notifyAll is needed.

author: skitching
msg: Minor code tidyup. There was no bug here before, but this change avoids any confusion.
